main.name: Tan Jia Jun
main.description: I'm open to new challenges within any industry and am willing to work hard to reach both company and my goals. I'm self motvatied and an excellent team player.
main.bio: I'm pursuing computer science in NTU and currently on my final semester of university. Looking for Full-Time/ Internship opportunity from May 2020 onward. I'm specialise in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. Did a few projects in the above mentioned field. I'm also very interested in software engineering opportunities to integrate and expand my skill sets.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Enriched in developing and managing software development. Explored specific specialization on ARTIFICAL INTELLIGENCE and DATA SCIENCE & ANALYTICS, extracting trend in the big data world.
Enriched in intergrating both software and hardward aspect. Explored specific specialization on Network Systems & Security, trained on network configuration and security for cisco router and switch.

work.title: Research and Development Engineer
work.description: Research and Develop machine learning models for auto slotting of items. Collect and analyze the images and audios. Create and deploy RESTful architecture for local server.

work.title: Outreach Workshop Facilitator
work.description: Facilitated JC and poly students capabilities of computational thinking, through hands-on RaspberryPi topped with SenseHAT and Pololu M3pi-robot. Guided students through basic python programming knowledge.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed program written in C# with SQL to extract data transmitted from RFID devices to calculate the distance and location for real time monitoring system. Manage an IT infrastructure for all IT devices used in the same network throughout the project. Wrote user manuals for training purpose on configure of device for co-worker and end users.

projects.title: Sight dream
projects.category: A React based website to save memory photo. (In-progress)
